hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
~/devstack/unstack.sh || true cd neutron_ci sudo pip install ecdsa junitxml requests testtools netifaces nose fabric python-heatclient python-keystoneclient python-glanceclient export NEXUS_IP=172.29.172.140 export NEXUS_USER=admin export NEXUS_PASSWORD=c3l12345 export NEXUS_INTF_NUM=1/35 export NEXUS_VLAN_START=3160 export NEXUS_VLAN_END=3199 export BASE_LOG_PATH="" export LOG_PATH="" export OFFLINE_NODE_WHEN_COMPLETE="" export OS_AUTH_URL="" export OS_DNS="" export OS_FLAVOR_NAME=devstack.medium export OS_IMAGE_NAME=devstack-trusty-\d+.template.openstack.org export OS_PASSWORD="" export OS_TENANT_NAME="" export OS_USERNAME="" export ZUUL_BRANCH="" export ZUUL_CHANGE="" export ZUUL_CHANGES="" export ZUUL_CHANGE_IDS="" export ZUUL_COMMIT="" export ZUUL_PATCHSET="" export ZUUL_PIPELINE="" export ZUUL_PROJECT=""
# Update specific Neutron repo. export ZUUL_REF="staging" export ZUUL_URL="https://github.com/cisco-openstack/neutron.git" export ZUUL_UUID=""
# Update specific Nova repo. sed -i '30 i NOVA_REPO=https://github.com/cisco-openstack/nova.git' ci/tests/test_ml2_nexus.py sed -i '30 i NOVA_BRANCH=staging' ci/tests/test_ml2_nexus.py
#export NODE_DEFAULT_ETH="p1p2" timeout --preserve-status -s 2 3600 nosetests ci/tests/test_ml2_nexus.py --with-xunit || true
